title: Magic Master Quinn, Skin Concept. With Skin Story.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Lord Apex,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=cM81Kvnd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-14T05:29:05.525+0000)
>
> No burd No buy

I know it was a long shot concept. Even calling the skin Mage Master was on the very bridge of confusion, since Quinn is a marksman, not a mage. The whole purpose is to inspire some wild ideas, for champions, such as giving a marksman a mage like skin. 
Her partner, Valor, would be hard to include into the skin, since, Quinn will be relying on magic. Again, it's just a concept, the likelihood of it happening is at a 0.01%. So don't worry.
